text: Kefasi Kasiteni Chitsala (born 24 June 1994) is a Malawian long-distance runner. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 5000 metres race; his time of 14:52.89 in the heats did not qualify him for the final. He was the flag bearer for Malawi in the Parade of Nations. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Malawian male long- distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Malawi Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Commonwealth Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Malawi Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 African Games
title: Kefasi Chitsala
